name: Игра забытых Богов. Проснись / Game of the forgotten Gods. Wake up
description: The game of forgotten gods. Wake up is a dynamic action game, sword fighting, magic tricks, and an exciting adventure deep into the mysteries of the world, which are protected by invisible force.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista or 7 Processor: Core 2 duo or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD  3000 or better Storage: 23 GB available space
